greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: G.f. A(x) satisfies: A(x) = 1 + x * A(x)^4 * (1 +  2 * A(x)).
link: Seiichi Manyama, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..655
mathematica: a[n_] := Sum[2^k * Binomial[n, k] * Binomial[4*n + k + 1, n]/(4*n + k + 1), {k, 0, n}];  Array[a, 19, 0] (* _Amiram Eldar_, Jul 27 2020 *)
program: (PARI) {a(n) = local(A=1+x*O(x^n)); for(i=0, n, A=1+x*A^4*(1+2*A)); polcoeff(A, n)}
(PARI) {a(n) = sum(k=0, n, 2^(n-k)*binomial(4*n+1, k)*binomial(5*n-k, n-k))/(4*n+1)} \\ _Seiichi Manyama_, Jul 26 2020
results.author: _Seiichi Manyama_, Jul 25 2020
